item.title: Feinberg Brings Wall Street Drive to Rare-Earth Minerals Push
item.description: Just four months into his tenure at the Pentagon, private equity billionaire Steve Feinberg has landed his first big deal: a $400 million bet on the US’s only miner of rare-earth elements, a key commo
